doc.line: Accuracy = enum(POSITION_UNKNOWN=0x00, POSITION_GPS_3D=0x01, POSITION_GPS_2D=0x02, POSITION_DR=0x03)
UNIX timestamp from epoch, 0 means invalid.
Latitude in degrees.
Longitude in degrees.
Altitude in meters (can be negative).
Heading value in degrees, clockwise, zero is north.
Speed in km/h.
Horizontal DOP value.
Vertical DOP value.
GetPosition = This method returns the current position.
UNIX timestamp from epoch, 0 means invalid.
Latitude in degrees.
Longitude in degrees.
GetLastKnownPosition = This method returns the last known position. Valid only if UTCtime is non-zero.
Firmware version in format STA8088.XXXx, where Xs are digits and x is a lowercase letter. "Unknown ver." means version hasn't been obtained from the GPS yet.
GetGPSFirmwareVersion = This method returns the firmware version of the used GPS device.
Count of the satellites, which are used for position calculation.
GetSatelliteInfo = This method returns the current satellite information.
Id of the DTC = enum(DTC_ANT_SHORT=0x11, DTC_ANT_OPEN=0x13, DTC_ANT_OVERCURR=0x1D, DTC_NMEA_FAILURE=0x92)
Setting or clearing of the DTC = enum(DTC_ACTION_SET=0x00, DTC_ACTION_CLEAR=0x01)
GPSDiagnostics = This signal is sent when a DTC is set or cleared.
